#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define ll long long
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
ll a[100001];
int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    vector<ll> v;
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        v.clear();
        rep(i,n){
            cin >> a[i];
        }
        for(int i=1;i<=n-1;i++)
        v.pb(a[i]-a[i-1]);
        int ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<v.size()-1;i++){
            if(v[i]*v[i+1] <0)
            ans++;
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
}
